name: Fx Logo App Button/Styled Tabs-WinXP - Fx 15+
description: For the latest Firefox 15+ builds. Userstyle for Firefox 5 and up to the latest Fx 14 builds found here: style 39905 This style makes the App menu button an Iconized Firefox Logo button when window is maximized with Tabs in Titlebar and minimizes the "window caption controls". This also modifies the appearance of inactive tabs making them more visible on Window OS Themes or Moderately dark Personas Themes and restores the "modern rounded tab styling" that was removed from "Windows OS only" due to Bug 570279, just prior to the releasing of Firefox 4. This also styles the Tab favicon and Urlbar favicon of New/Blank tabs and about:home . !Important! After applying this userstyle you may have to toggle the Window state from (Minimize to Maximize) or restart the browser, so the style will appear correctly. Tested on latest Aurora & Nightly builds.
obsoletion_message: Firefox 5 Now released: Style updated here: style 39905
additional_info:
Updated 03-08-2013
Fixed a compatibility issue...

Updated 06-07-2012
Now only compatible with latest Firefox 15+ builds, userstyle for Firefox 5 and up to the latest Fx 14 builds found here:
style 39905

To customize or fix Firefox nightlies and betas, you can also have a look at my other styles: user 61655
